info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to tactical gear via <info>QASM interface</info>.
This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>Multi-Dot panels</info>.
restriction: Item must be compatible with the Multi-Dot interface

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>PALS webbing on the back</info>.
restriction: Item must be a MOLLE attachment for the back

info: This decorative item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>hook-and-loop panels</info>.
restriction: Item must be a hook-and-loop attachment

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>.
restriction: Item must be a hook-and-loop pouch

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>.
restriction: Item must be a hook-and-loop panel

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>a worn waist belt</info>.
This item can be <good>attached</good> to <info>a worn waist belt</info>.
restriction: Item must be large belt-capable gear

info: This item can be <info>worn on the inside</info> of a <info>large boot</info>.
This item can be <info>worn on the inside</info> of a <info>tall boot</info>.

restriction: Item must be either a gun sling or a gun with a sling attached

//: used for negating an invisible encumbrance malus while wearing plate carriers without cummerbunds
used for calculating plate carrier proficiency progress

info: This type of cummerbund can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> with <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>.
restriction: Cummerbund must have hook-and-loop attachment points

info: This type of cummerbund can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> with the <info>National Molding Quad Release interface</info>, which is commonly used with the U.S. Armed Forces plate carriers.
restriction: Cummerbund must have buckles for the Quad Release system

info: These shoulder straps can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> or <info>chest rigs</info>, in order to slightly improve their encumbrance.
restriction: Item must be a pair of shoulder straps

info: This type of side pouches can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> or <info>chest rigs</info> with <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>.
restriction: Side pouch must have hook-and-loop attachment points

info: This type of hanging pouches can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> or <info>chest rigs</info> with <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>.
restriction: Hanging pouch must have hook-and-loop attachment points

info: This type of pouches can be <good>attached</good> to <info>plate carriers</info> or <info>chest rigs</info> with <info>hook-and-loop surfaces</info>, sitting under or aside from other pouches while retaining functionality.
restriction: Pouch must have hook-and-loop attachment points

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to plate carriers, chest rigs, and backpacks as <info>an EUD bridge</info>.
restriction: Item must be compatible with the EUD interface
